Above are first runs over 18 hours or so: sorted maxd from triplets and then the counter.
best runtime over 20 iterations, in ns, runtime of nanopk()

Below are "stabilized" tick ratios.  It is fairly stable to 8 decimal places to the right for quite a few seconds, as
expected with a 7 - 9 ppm clock drift.

0.37594220133889
0.37594233070650
0.37594231796227
0.37594233140061
0.37594232383695
0.37594232294905
0.37594232462948
